EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_PCF Virtual User Group Beta_2018.Feb 27 session announcement email
EmailTemplate.subject: Registration Required: February 27 EMEA Virtual PCF User Group and Upcoming Meeting Reminders!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
PCF User Group members!
We are excited to announce our first EMEA PCF User Group of 2019! Hear from Juergen Sussner, IT Architect at DATEV eG sharing their experience implementing PCF.
Here is additional information about upcoming meetings in February & April.
- February 19th Virtual Meeting with T-Mobile <[[https://connect.pivotal.io/pcf-user-group-feb-2019.html]]> Come hear James Webb from the T-Mobile platform engineering team on how T-Mobile leveraged their success with PCF to deliver production Kubernetes using PKS.
- Feb 27th EMEA Virtual PCF User Group <[[https://connect.pivotal.io/emea-pcf-user-group-feb27-2019]]> Juergen Sussner, IT Architect at DATEV eG, will share some of the technical details of the Pivotal Cloud Foundry implementation at DATEV, the experiences they've had so far, and what they expect for the future. - April 1st In-Person Meeting at CF Summit, Philadelphia <[[https://connect.pivotal.io/pcf-user-group-april-2019.html]]> Join Pivotal and your peers on April 1 for a special user group meeting with the theme Containers, Kubernetes and the Pivotal Container Service (PKS).
The Webex details for our virtual meetings will be in your confirmation email, along with a way to download a calendar appointment. If you have any questions please reach out to Madison Schlegel at mschlegel@pivotal.io <[[mailto: mschlegel@pivotal.io]]>.
Looking forward to seeing you at these upcoming meetings!
Your hosts, Dormain Drewitz & John Allwright
